data.text: @jaanis888 @VMNVD Paldies par atbalstu! Tiksimies mūsu lidojumos jau pavisam drīz! Veselību!
@jaanis888 @VMNVD Labvakar! Konkrētais reiss tiek veikts ar mūsu Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnu!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia

data.text: @AivarsTennisUK Good evening and thanks for the suggestion. Currently no such plans for the regular route however we will pass the tweet. Stay safe as well and thanks for the support! 🙂👋

@RichardGerrar17 Hi! Thanks for your suggestion. Currently no plans however we will pass the suggestion. Check our social media channels for such news in the future. Till then - stay safe and healthy!
@pulks @viedoklis2 @Vinkele Attālums no Rīgas līdz Urumči ir aptuveni 4500 km un plānotais lidojuma ilgums atpakaļceļā - 6 stundas un 35 minūtes.
@pulks @viedoklis2 @Vinkele Jā, konkrētajam reisam papildu apstāšanās vietu nebūs - lidojam tiešajā reisā atpakaļ uz Rīgu!

data.text: We are on our way home from  Ürümqi Diwopu International Airport in China carrying 5.1 tonnes or approximately one million face masks and respirators. Flight is performed after a request from National Health Service of the Republic of Latvia. 📸 by AirLink Aviation Services https://t.co/uhnDrBaKUI

Esam mājupceļā no Ķīnas ar ilgi gaidītu kravu - 619 kastēm ar aptuveni vienu miljonu sejas masku un respiratoru. Lidojumu veicām pēc @VMNVD lūguma. Ar kravu Rīgā plānojam ierasties 29. marta agrā rītā. 📸: AirLink Aviation Services https://t.co/DxTHX424la
@viedoklis2 @Vinkele Labvakar! Konkrētā lidmašīna nes Bauskas vārdu! 🇱🇻

We continue to perform the special flights to bring Baltic people home. Safety of our passengers and employees is above all - due to safety our crew has changed their uniforms to special suits. During flights, we provide passengers with face masks and disinfection wipes. https://t.co/KbZv41vC06
@AlbaMoranteZar Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details (your booking reference) privately? Thank you!
@normis Labdien! Pārbaudījām un redzam, ka pieprasījums naudas atmaksai ir saņemts. Lielās noslodzes dēļ naudas atmaksa var aizņemt vairākas nedēļas. Paldies par pacietību.
@juglists @Talis_L Visas cenas lidojumos ir fiksētā cenā.
@juglists @Talis_L Labdien! Cenas visiem lidojumiem atrodamas saitē, kas pievienota tvītam.

airBaltic will perform additional special flights from London and Frankfurt to Riga. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/GwkZrrjuDm https://t.co/Mu3Jfcmcw6

airBaltic izpildīs papildu lidojumus no Londonas un Frankfurtes uz Rīgu. Latvijas, Igaunijas un Lietuvas pilsoņi un šo valstu pastāvīgie iedzīvotāji, kuri vēlas atgriezties, tiek aicināti rezervēt biļetes, zvanot uz īpašu tālruni: https://t.co/VxlBVZrXHj https://t.co/xX1AzZPECZ
@Dan_Haus Hello, Dan. May we ask you to send us your booking reference number in DM message privately? Thank you.
@AJPunk100 Hello! Please check your DM messages.
@manohar_pb Hello! Thanks for your message. Please share with us in a DM your booking reference number, we'll take a look.
@7Apknn Labdien! Pieejamo vietu daudzums mainās ar katru brīdi, tāpēc, lai rezervētu biļetes, aicinām mums zvanīt: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d

airBaltic will perform special flights from Malaga and Amsterdam to Riga. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/rI9rdZhzqK https://t.co/vvasmNe3JF

airBaltic izpildīs īpašos lidojumus no Malagas un Amsterdamas uz Rīgu. Latvijas, Igaunijas un Lietuvas pilsoņi un šo valstu pastāvīgie iedzīvotāji, kuri vēlas atgriezties, tiek aicināti rezervēt biļetes, zvanot uz īpašu tālruni: https://t.co/VxlBVZrXHj https://t.co/A810h02mTv

@plasticstoat If you wish you may contact our Reservations department by e-mail reservations@airbaltic.lv, however please be informed that it may take few weeks for an answer as currently we are receiving thousands of requests. Thank you.
@valdis_vl Labdien! Aicinām sekot līdzi jaunākajai informācijai mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d, kā arī Ārlietu un Satiksmes Ministriju kanālos.

@AnnaStachel Thank you. In that case it is still in the queue to be processed. Our team is doing everything in their power to process them as fast as possible, however as there are many requests at the moment, it still may take some time. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
@7Apknn Labrīt! Saņēmām no kolēģiem informāciju, ka šis reiss ir izpārdots.

@plasticstoat Good morning! If this is concerning a refund, please be informed that it won't be possible to accelerate it - please check our answers in DM messages previously. We thank for your patience.
@AnnaStachel Hello, Anna. Did you flew back on March 15th by using a new ticket, or did you changed it from the flight originally booked on March 16th?
@Robbert71800801 Hello Robbert! Thank you so much for kind words - they give us strength! Stay safe and healthy during these times!
@TheConfidentSi2 Visi norādītie laiki ir pēc vietējām laika zonām, tātad izlidošanas laiks reisam no Londonas - pēc Lielbritānijas laika zonas.
@awakeagnese Labdien, Agnese! Jā, šo lidojumu rezervācijās ir iekļauta nododamā bagāža un Jūs varēsiet to nodot.

@spuriousbeige Hello, Trish! No, this is not a repatriation flight - it's our regular, commercial flight.
Currently it's planned to be operated as scheduled.
@stayinasya Labdien! Uz šo telefona numuru saņemam ļoti daudz zvanu. Lūgsim pāris minūtes uzgaidīt un mēģināt velreiz. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām!

@Vituce @Arlietas @edgarsrinkevics @LVembassyUK @LettlandinDE @Sat_Min @BaibaBraze @Brivibas36 @ltvpanorama @RIGATV24 Labdien, Vita! Informāciju par šiem lidojumiem un to, kā iegādāties biļetes, atradīsiet šeit: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d

airBaltic will perform special flights from London, Frankfurt, Abu Dhabi, Tbilisi, Istanbul and Amsterdam to Riga. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us: https://t.co/rI9rdZhzqK https://t.co/xO6MTB6nCr

airBaltic izpildīs īpašos lidojumus no Londonas, Frankfurtes, Abū Dabī, Stambulas, Tbilisi un Amsterdamas uz Rīgu. Latvijas, Igaunijas un Lietuvas pilsoņi un šo valstu pastāvīgie iedzīvotāji, kuri vēlas atgriezties, tiek aicināti rezervēt biļetes: https://t.co/VxlBVZrXHj https://t.co/fGmR6Q49HZ
@7Apknn Labdien! Lūdzam apskatīt savas privātās ziņas - nupat atbildējām tur.
@Egitins Labdien, Egii! Vai varam lūgt vairāk informācijas (tostarp jūsu rezervācijas numuru) atsūtīt privātā vēstulē? Paldies!
@vilipsokeans Hello! Please check your private messages - we have sent our answer there. Thank you!

airBaltic izpildīs īpašos lidojumus no Abū Dabī, Stambulas, Tbilisi un Amsterdamas uz Rīgu. Latvijas, Igaunijas un Lietuvas pilsoņi, kā arī šo valstu pastāvīgie iedzīvotāji, kuri vēlas atgriezties, tiek aicināti rezervēt biļetes, zvanot uz īpašu tālruni: https://t.co/VxlBVZrXHj https://t.co/PW5A2chjKt

airBaltic will perform special flights from Abu Dhabi, Tbilisi, Istanbul and Amsterdam to Riga. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/rI9rdZhzqK https://t.co/TlJGNPhJm4

@prisonnier0 Hello! Thanks for your message. We are sorry to hear of that - our apologies for the flight cancellation. May we kindly ask more details about your reservation in a private message? We'll take a look. Thank you!

@darzins Labdien! Biļešu cenas norādītas mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d.
Gandrīz visi lidojumi no Londonas ir izpārdoti, palikušas vien pāris biļetes lidojumā šodien. Lidojums paredzēts jau pēc pāris stundām.

airBaltic will perform special flights from Istanbul, London, Tbilisi and Amsterdam to Riga. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/GwkZrrjuDm https://t.co/yqU0jwrFBS
@GeorgenaRatliff Hello, Georgena. Please check your private messages - we just sent our answer there.

airBaltic has scheduled special flights from London, Tbilisi and Amsterdam to Riga. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/GwkZrrjuDm https://t.co/K0JVKuhXuO

@AivarsTennisUK Hello, Aivars! Currently we do not have such information. We would encourage you to follow latest updates on ours and @Arlietas social media profiles. Once we have more information, we will publish it here and on our webpage.

urls.title: Online payment form | airBaltic
urls.description: You can use this form to apply for flight date/time change and/or passenger name change, or to pay for baggage, sports equipment, inflight meals, the unaccompanied minor service or transporting a pet.

data.text: @vilipsokeans Hello! To request the date change for your ticket, we kindly invite you to use this form: https://t.co/fPF8Ejm5H1

If your flight is canceled, you can choose to receive @airBaltic flight voucher, that covers full refund value and gives you extra EUR 20 for one way flight for your travel in the future✈ This refund can be requested via online form: https://t.co/4bz7lTzhyb https://t.co/gXqMB95WwT
@pupudijss Labdien! Aicinām sekot gan mūsu, gan Satiksmes ministrijas, gan Ārlietu ministrijas mājas lapām un sociālo tīklu profiliem - informācija sekos tur.

@JSpakovska Labdien Julia! Ja vairs nav pieejamu lidojumu, bet Jums jānokļūst Latvijā, aicinām aizpildīt šo veidlapu, lai reģistrētos potenciālajam repatriācijas lidojumam. Tam var pretendēt LR pilsoņi, kā arī pastāvīgie Latvijas iedzīvotāji, kuri vēlas atgriezties: https://t.co/XuD9yOphPk
@TheConfidentSi2 Labdien! Aicinām sekot gan mūsu, gan Satiksmes, gan Ārlietu ministrijas mājas lapām un sociālo tīklu kontiem - informācija sekos tur.

airBaltic will perform one flight from Malta and one to and from London and Riga on March 20. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/GwkZrrjuDm https://t.co/W2NCzKDkh9
@R5Latvia @Talis_L @edgarsrinkevics Sveiciens vēlreiz! Lūdzam vēlreiz ieskatīties DM ziņās, paldies!
@R5Latvia Labdien! Lūdzam skatīt privātās ziņas.
@Lupatniece2 Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā atsūtīt Jūsu rezervācijas numuru, kā arī minēto kļūdas paziņojumu?

@Lupatniece2 Hello! As you might be aware, due to extraordinary situation and cancelled flights our Reservations department teams are currently really busy with processing all the incoming messages as well as calls, we thank for your understanding.
RT @Arlietas: ‼️SVARĪGA informācija ceļotājiem, kuri atgriežas Latvijā! #ceļodroši #ceļoatbildīgi https://t.co/yijRungyBi
@bvasilecs Good evening! Please DM us privately your booking reference number.

@RitaEvaNa @Arlietas Labvakar! Šo konkrēto čarterreisu organizēja tūrfirma "Atlantic Travel". Biļetes uz šo lidojumu netika iegādātas pie mums. Lūdzam ar jautājumiem vai neskaidrībām vērsties pie minētās tūrfirmas. Paldies.

Bringing Baltics home 🇱🇻🇪🇪🇱🇹
airBaltic will perform a flight from Larnaca to Riga on March 19. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania who wish to return from Cyprus to contact us via special phone line: https://t.co/GwkZrrjuDm https://t.co/gkhWHJypP2

@IneseF29 Labvakar! Šo konkrēto čarterreisu organizē tūrfirma "Atlantic Travel". Biļetes uz šo lidojumu netiek iegādātas pie mums. Lūdzam ar jautājumiem vai neskaidrībām vērsties pie minētās tūrfirmas. Paldies.
@Rasstoffsky We better advise you to submit it once again - please double check ALL the details before submitting.  Thank you.

@Rasstoffsky Unfortunately we will not have answer for this question at the moment. All these requests will be reviewed for the possible repatriation flights. You will be contacted with more details. Thank you.
@IlzeOzolina Labdien! Lūdzam sekot līdzi jaunākajai informācijai šajā sakarā mūsu mediju kanālos, vai Satiksmes Ministrijas mājaslapā: https://t.co/XXizHcN0tT
@Rasstoffsky Unfortunately we were not able to replicate the problem, therefore kindly invite you either to try from another device, or private/incognito window on your browser.
@Rasstoffsky Thank you. We will check with the team and get back. Please delete this tweet as it contains also your personal details.
@Rasstoffsky Could you please screenshot this error message? Does the same error persists from different device/internet connection?

@Rasstoffsky Hello! Please use this link for the repatriation request: https://t.co/xjzGq3k9rn
Regarding the phones lines, please be informed that they are busy as all our teams are doing their best to assist the passengers. We thank for your patience and understanding.

data.text: @bigelirmisin Hello! It takes 4-6 weeks and it will be returned to the card/bank account which was used for the ticket purchase.
@Tnewalke @MaarcisV Please DM us more details with your booking reference number as well as the said error message, we will check.
@spuriousbeige Thank you, you too!
@spuriousbeige Hello! We will not have such details available at the moment. We kindly ask to check for the latest information either on our media channels or Ministry of Transport of Latvia.
@AliskaBariska Please check your DM messages for support.
@Elhanchik Labdien! Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā sīkākas detaļas? Paldies.
@ulyana_bachoy As all the flights are cancelled from March 17th till April 14th, you may request the refund also via the form we sent to you. Thank you.

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

urls.title: Booking Cancellation | airBaltic
urls.description: We know that sometimes plans change and you might need to cancel our flights. Find out about available refund options depending on your ticket type.

data.text: @ulyana_bachoy Hello! If you are experiencing technical issues while requesting the refund and your reservation was purchased on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg, we kindly invite you to use this form: https://t.co/6KPJ8x5ELK

@Jaspincairn1 @VereMike Hello! We do understand your frustration, however, please be informed that our colleagues are doing their best to process all the requests of tens of thousands of passengers. If you have requested refund, you will receive it in the next 4-6 weeks. Thanks for your understanding.

@Diana55943176 @Arlietas Labrīt! Šo konkrēto čarterreisu organizē tūrfirma "Atlantic Travel". Biļetes uz šo lidojumu netiek iegādātas pie mums. Lūdzam ar jautājumiem vai neskaidrībām vērsties pie minētās tūrfirmas. Paldies

@mariedzp Please fill the form below - "Couldn’t find your booking reference? Fill out this form instead!". 
And yes, if your flights were changed or cancelled by us, you will receive a full refund.
@RitaEvaNa Labvakar, Rita! Šo čarterlidojumu organizē tūrisma aģentūra "Atlantic Travel" - mēs esam tā izpildītāji. Neskaidrību vai jautājumu gadījumā aicināsim vērsties pie aģentūras. Paldies!

urls.title: Booking Cancellation | airBaltic
urls.description: We know that sometimes plans change and you might need to cancel our flights. Find out about available refund options depending on your ticket type.

data.text: @mariedzp Hello, Mariami! Thank you for reaching out to us! In this case we would kindly invite you to fill this form: https://t.co/6KPJ8x5ELK
@AgneseMargevica @Sat_Min @Arlietas Šo konktēto čarterreisu organizē tūrfirma "Atlantic Travel". Biļetes uz šo lidojumu netiek iegādātas pie mums.
@AgneseMargevica Mēs saprotam, tomēr ar šiem jautājumiem aicināsim vērsties pie minētās aģentūras.
@AgneseMargevica Labvakar, Agnese! Šo lidojumu organizē tūrisma aģentūra "Atlantic Travel" - mēs esam tā izpildītāji. Lūdzam ar jautājumiem vai neskaidrībām vērsties pie minētās aģentūras. Paldies!

airBaltic has scheduled the first repatriation flight from Tenerife to Riga on March 17. We encourage citizens and permanent residents of the Republic of Latvia who wish to return after March 17 to fill a form for potential repatriation flights here: https://t.co/aSTOFNHCrT https://t.co/jtjT1YOa00

17. martā @airbaltic izpildīs pirmo repatriācijas čarterreisu no Tenerifes. Mēs aicinām Latvijas Republikas pilsoņus un pastāvīgos iedzīvotājus, kuri vēlas atgriezties valstī pēc 17. marta, aizpildīt pieprasījuma formu uz iespējamiem repatriācijas reisiem: https://t.co/wYrbQee2HV https://t.co/VcAT460cN5

Uzmanību! Lūdzam ielidojošos pasažierus ar saslimšanas simptomiem vērsties pie mediķiem @riga_airport E un C atlidošanā pirms bagāžas saņemšanas! Pasažieriem, kas ierodas no vīrusa skartajām teritorijām, jāievēro obligāta pašizolācija 14 dienas! https://t.co/JvTIawW1nC

Attention! Arriving passengers with any symptoms of the disease are asked to contact the medical staff in @riga_airport arrivals E and C before baggage reclaim. Passengers arriving from virus affected territories are obliged to stay at home quarantine for 14 days! https://t.co/84zIFvi8cF
@IvoKlotins @Talis_L Lieliski! Paldies par Jūsu atbalstu!
@ezra_artist We thank for your patience and understanding.

@ezra_artist Hello! Please be informed that our teams are doing all their best to assist as many passengers as it's possible, however as we are receiving many requests at the moment, can advise you to call, if the issue is urgent, or wait for an answer if it's for the flight in the future.

@wittgen44020293 Hello! We kindly invite you to delete this tweet as it contains such sensitive information as your booking reference numbers. Regarding the questions - refund for your 1st reservation can be requested via "My Booking", second has been already done (will be in account in 4-6weeks)
